title: Quitting until lethality is fixed
body:
Varus taking over 60% of my HP with one Q when I have Zonya's. Then Jhin follows up with one auto dealing 1k damage. Dead.

So much fun playing this game right now, so much fun.

I'd rather play Tetris than this bullshit.

cancer is more like an infection where the cancer cells replicate and replace living, healthy cells until there is not enough food or space to sustain their life

the body reacts to them much like any ailment, actually destroying them if possible, but dietary as well as other issues cause the immune system to not be able to match the rate of replication until it spirals out of control
Actually, cancer cells are rarely attacked by the body, since they ARE the body's own cells.

actually, the body attacks its own unhealthy cells all the time in order to keep the body functioning properly but that is the reason why cancer is a problem.  If for some reason the person contracts a disease which weakens the immune system (or other ailments of similar accord such as diet, exercise, etc), then the immune system cannot cope with the new problem at hand.

i'll look up the rate cancer cells multiply:  and that wasn't helpful.

you are correct that the body does not attack the unhealthy cells, but that becomes the problem.  It does attack them, but at the rate cancer cells grow, it would be like diverting every white blood cell in the body to deal with one infection, which is impossible

so, it is very similar to our problems with league at the moment, small problems continue to grow out of hand and then a major problem arises when the body itself can no longer handle the infection

cancer is very much like a virus but the only distinction between it and a virus is that it is the body's own cells that are the problem, which makes the problem worse.

Viruses work by injecting parts of their own genetic code into a cell and this makes that cell reproduce with a copy of the virus in each new cell.  Cancer cells are the body's own cells suffering from a mutation that can go undetected but causes problems with the healthy cells due to a lack of food and space for the body to sustain that part of itself.  Effectively, cancer causes you to rot from the inside out, just like a virus, but unlike most viruses, Cancer cells divide endlessly until the body dies whereas viruses divide to reproduce and move to new regions to infect more host bodies.

I had 188 Armor as Ahri, since I decided to buy a Deadman's Plate because there were Jayce, Pantheon, and Varus all stacking Lethality and either a LDR/BC, although Varus had a LDR not a BC.

Lethality is the tip of the iceberg. There are so many things wrong with this game, that these days I only play ARAM and vs. bots because of how fked the balance is.

My interest in Ranked play was killed off around the time they made ADCs hit harder than a mage's q,w,e combo; I used to main mage and now they feel like they are the red-headed stepchild of League.

the devs love AD, and will buff them to unholy levels of damage while turning a deaf ear to the complaints from tanks, supports, and mages getting 2-shotted by the AD monsters. What has happened with Lethality was expected: they introduce a new mechanic that completely breaks the game because its AD-based, and the devs can't control themselves. 

Sorry kids, it ain't gonna get better; maybe a nerf later on, but then they get a new idea and they break the game once again; a viscous cycle of stupidity.

Game's been getting worse and worse since S6. After 1500 matches since S2, I can't even stand to play thanks to everything (even pure tanks) melting in <4 seconds.

I've seen several occasions where people play by the philosophy "If it doesn't add damage, it's a waste of gold." Defense is a dead stat since you can't nuke with it and health just means you take more damage.

Used to love playing support champs like Janna. Could throw a shield on and it would absorb a few hits without any AP. Now a boosted shield might stop half of one. Support roles can't even enter striking range anymore without dying to getting sneezed on. Should just get rid of this depressing garbage.
